post.body: Is editing The Song Of Heroes!!! Finally. lulz
Pat, the cake was a lie. Ant tonight im going ice-skating for the first time... this should be interesting.
Stupid freezing rain. Oh well, at least its forcing me to read and write and be productive.
well, at least it hasnt been 18 days again.... writing a 50 word essay, easy peasy then off to dinner the mythology class!
18 days. damn. Packing, class, lunch, friends, game, then home for Thanksgiving. Go BSU! beat Western Michigan!
Im extremely lazy this week. I should be writing a commercial or PSA for TCOM class or finishing up the SOH, But lounging around sounds fun.
I just finished the first draft of Part 1 of The Song of Heroes!!!
Damn, why couldnt Fall Break be like 5 days? Apparently i make really stupid decisions when im tired but oh well. Kings Island was fun tho.
Glad that i came home this weekend. I had an amazing time!! I wish Fall Break was a little longer...
Im waiting for my night class to start so that it can be over so i can go home and have an AWESOME weekend!
Im waiting for class. maybe i should take a nap? It looks like im going home this weekend and not Florida. oh well, it'll be fun.
Writing either a new poem or Music review. Family Force 5, Kaiser Chiefs, or Anberlin??
History, Philosophy, Lunch, then home. :)
Going home this weekend will be good for me i think. Plus it should be pretty fun, at least i hope. Before i go, Ramayana and a paper on it.
Almost fin with Part 1.. Im being followed, again. Going to read the Ramayana, hopefully finished soon. And i know you notice.
Is attempting to work on the Song Of Heroes... We'll see how that works out.
Day-um, ive been missing House too. :/ im going to attempt to write again!!! possibly some more Song Of Heroes. Or try to finish Edgar.
Now has a futon and 2 strobe lights. Now all i need is a LED stack and a disco ball.
Is reading One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovitch.
Seriously has no motivation right now... :/
